name: Door 6
tag_list: game-development, software-development, vacuum, android-games, iphone-games, smartphone-games, mobile-gaming, portable-gaming, gaming, video-gaming, video-games, games, 3d-games, immersive
overview:
Door 6 is a software development firm based in Madison, WI focused on game development for smartphones. Door 6 is developing the next generation of mobile games, delivering unparalleled gaming experiences on phones and tablets.

Its first retail release was Vacuum in March 2010 for $1.99 in the Android Market. Vacuum was the first Android application to offer cash prizes to its top players. In January, 2011, Vacuum was reduced to Free on the Android Market.

Atmosphere: The Training Mission was a Top 20 Finalist in Google’s Android Developer Challenge 2 within the Arcade Games category.

milestones.description: Launched Vacuum and announced the cash prizes for the Global Competition
